meanings.definition: Not trodden upon or traveled over
meanings.sent1: The untreaded path through the forest was covered in fallen leaves.
meanings.sent2: The untreaded snow glistened in the sunlight.
meanings.sent3: The untreaded ground seemed to beckon the curious explorer.
meanings.sent4: Her untreaded thoughts led her to new creative ideas.
meanings.sent5: The untreaded field was a blank canvas waiting to be explored.

meanings.sent1: The untreaded decision was made in haste.
meanings.sent2: His untreaded words left a lasting impact on the conversation.
meanings.sent3: The untreaded plan turned out to be surprisingly successful.
meanings.sent4: Her untreaded path led to unexpected opportunities.
meanings.sent5: The untreaded route proved to be the most efficient choice.
